oracle text:
2/4
When Peelback enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets Peelback, create a 2/2 green Banana creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice all Banana creatures you control.
"We may look silly, but don't underestimate our magic."
